review_data.content: Gut für einen Drink (grosse Auswahl) und etwas kleines zum Essen (sehr kleine Auswahl). Ich kann die Gamberini empfehlen: lauwarme...More

review_data.title: Place for a drink
review_data.content: Went for coffee and that was good. The croissants were delicious. Service inattentive and very distracted. Will I choose this place for a drink? Yes. Will I choose this place for a meal? Probably not.

review_data.title: Perfek gelegen für einen Drink

review_data.title: Guter Ort für kleinen Lunch oder Dessert
review_data.content: Schön auf dem Sechsiläutenplatz gelegen mit kleinen Imbissen für Zwischendurch oder schönen italienischen Desserts oder Kaffees.

review_data.title: Great venue for a pre-dinner drink
review_data.content: This elegant modern bar is actually part of the new opera underground parking and sits right at the edge for the historical Sechseläuten Platz, near the Bellevue. Because of it's location, it's a great place to meet for pre-dinner drinks or a night at the...More

review_data.title: Elegant little cafe by Zurich Lake
review_data.content: I never noticed this little cafe and bar in the middle of Sechseläutenplatz. I thought it was part of the parking garage at first! It's quite elegant and cute, and right by the lake. Great view of the opera house and nice place to go...More

review_data.title: Excellent & peaceful
review_data.content: Very happy going here after the disastrous time at the pumpstation along the lake, this place was peaceful, quiet, friendly & efficient unlike the other place. Also a lovely view of the opera house, shame about the red & white building planks though but they...More

review_data.title: Café und Bar im Herzen von Zürich

review_data.title: Not a bad place for a coffee or drink, but skip the food.
review_data.content: I went to Collana because it is in a good location and has a great view and magazines and newspapers to read (I was dining alone). The atmosphere was pleasant and the service was good but my ravioli were terrible. Supposedly homemade and fresh, it...More

review_data.title: Sophisticated but casual with an Italian flair
review_data.content: George Clooney's favorite bar in Zurich. Viewing the two of the main squares in Zurich while drinking an espresso, brings some Italian temperament to Zurich and gives you a good feeling.
